attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Supermarkets and producers should be forced to used recycleable materials ...
Supermarkets should stop using plastic bags or charge for them, offering cloth re-usable bags as in Germany etc
Also packaging could be mad so that it is recycleable ... remember the Corona glass pop bottles with the 10p deposit that encouraged purchasers to return them ... hence recycle, maybe this policy should be adopted.
Additionally all councils need to have the required processes in place to recycle all that we put out to be recycled.
Encourage everyone to have a composter for vegetation recycling, recycle wood for re-use or firewood for people with wood fired heating.
Why should we pay more for trying to co-operate?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
